title: BRIEF-Lendingtree Reports Q4 Adj Shr $0.84
text: 51 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Lendingtree Reports Q4 Adj Shr $0.84 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Lendingtree Inc: * LENDINGTREE REPORTS 4Q & FY 2017 RESULTS ABOVE GUIDANCE * Q4 REVENUE $161 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE UP 60 PERCENT * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.84 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.54 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SEES Q1 REVENUE $170 MILLION TO $175 MILLION * SEES FY REVENUE $770 MILLION TO $790 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 60 PERCENT TO $161 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.90, REVENUE VIEW $150.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $775.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q1 REVENUE VIEW $173.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text: [ reut.rs/2EVHHIL ] Further company coverage:
